law.catch_line: Partner's liability to other partners after dissolution.

text.section: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2) of this section and KRS 362.1-306, after dissolution a partner is liable to the other partners for the partner's share of any partnership liability incurred under KRS 362.1-804.

A partner who, with knowledge of the dissolution, incurs a partnership liability under KRS 362.1-804(2) by an act that is not appropriate for winding up the partnership business is liable to the partnership for any damage caused to the partnership arising from the liability.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 59, effective July 12, 2006.
